headline: AppLovin Corp (NASDAQ:APP): Leveraging Ad Shifts and AI for Success
summary: We came across a long thesis on Applovin Corp (NASDAQ:APP) on ValueInvestorsClub by yxd0950. In this article we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on APP. The company’s shares were trading at $84.57 when this thesis was published, vs. closing price of $350.65 on Jan 3rd. AppLovin Corp (NASDAQ:APP) is a technology company dedicated to enhancing […]

headline: AppLovin Stock: 2025 Should Be Different From 2024
summary: AppLovin's impressive growth in 2024, driven by AI and software platforms, is overshadowed by an overvaluation concern, leading me to maintain a Hold rating.
